question: Most common complication of ileostomy is:
exp: - Overall M/c complication of ileostomy -Skin excoriation / dermatitis - MC early complication of ileostomy - Ischemia / necrosis - MC complication of both end colostomy and loop colostomy - Parastomal hernia - Parastomal hernia is more common in END colostomy (due to extensive dissection) - Prolapse is more common in LOOP colostomy (due to larger opening)

question: Parastomal hernia is most frequently seen with:
exp: Parastomal hernia is most frequently seen with end colostomy. STOMAL COMPLICATIONS MC complication of both end & loop colostomy: Parastomal herniaQ Parastomal hernia is more common in end colostomyQas compared to loop colostomy. Prolapse is more common in loop colostomyQ MC complication of ileostomy: Skin irritationQ MC early complication of ileostomy: Ischemic necrosisQ
